title: How to Win the new Nemesis Draft mode in 1 Easy Step
body:
1) Pick the enemy team all mana-using champions.

Laugh and roll in the freelo as the ADC and Zed mains (So, you know, 99% of the playerbase) go oom in 2 minutes and get confused and lost when it doesn't go up to full in 20 seconds.
